All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AdminAssignmentForm
A form as a boundary level object for admin staff to assign a manager to a branch, promote a staff to a manager and transfer staff members across branches.
AdminBranchForm
A form for administrative staff as a boundary level object to perform branch-reltaed actions.
AdminDisplayForm
A form for administrative staff as a boundary level object to display various information about staff members.
AdminManagementForm
A form for administrative staff as a boundary level object to perform changes to staff accounts.
AdminPaymentForm
A form for administrative staff as a boundary level object to perform payment actions.
AdminView
Represents the view for administrative actions accessible to the admin role.
AppDisplay
An App Display Interface that will be implemented by StaffApp and CustomerApp Implementing classes provide methods to execute the display of the application interface.
Branch
The Branch class that represents the branches of a restaurant chain.
BranchDAO
BranchDAO is implemented from DAOInterface BranchDAO is a Data Access Object (DAO) for managing Branch objects with CRUD Operations.
CreditDebitPaymentService
The CreditDebitPaymentService class implements the PaymentService interface for credit/debit card payments (e.g.
CustomerApp
The CustomerApp class represents the entry point for customer users.
CustomerBranchController
The CustomerBranchController class implements the business logic layer operations related to branches for customers.
CustomerBranchLogin
The CustomerBranchLogin class is an authentication check for customers to choose which branch they wish to order from.
CustomerMenuController
The CustomerMenuController class implements the business logic layer operations related to menus for customers.
CustomerOrderController
The CustomerOrderController class implements the business logic layer operations related to customer orders.
CustomerOrderingForm
A form for customers as a boundary level object to order items and modify their order cart.
CustomerPaymentController
The CustomerPaymentController class implements the business logic layer operations related to payments for customers.
CustomerPaymentForm
A form for customers as a boundary level object to make payment.
CustomerPostOrderForm
A form for customers as a boundary level object for post-order activities such as viewing order status and picking up orders.
CustomerSession
A logger that logs the session for a customer.
DAOInterface<T>
This interface defines the contract for Data Access Objects (DAOs) to interact with a data source.
FOMSApp
Represents the main display for the Fastfood Ordering and Management System (FOMS).
FomsSystem
The main class for the FOMS system.
Form
The Form interface represents a generic form in the Fastfood Ordering and Management System (FOMS).
FormFactory
The FormFactory class is responsible for creating different types of forms based on the user session and action type.
LoginRole
Enum representing the roles for logging in (Customer or Staff).
ManagerDisplayForm
The ManagerDisplayForm class is a form that is a boundary level object for managers to perform display actions such as displaying the list of staff in their branch.
ManagerMenuForm
The ManagerMenuForm class is a form that is a boundary level object for managers to perform menu modification actions such as adding, editing, or removing menu items, changing item availability, and editing menu item descriptions.
ManagerView
The ManagerView class represents the view for a manager user.
MenuDAO
MenuDAO is a Data Access Object (DAO) for managing MenuItem objects with CRUD Operations.
MenuItem
The MenuItem class represents a menu item in a restaurant.
OnlinePaymentService
The OnlinePaymentService class implements the PaymentService interface for online payments service providers (e.g.
Order
The Order class represents an order made in a restaurant.
OrderDAO
OrderDAO is implemented from DAOInterface OrderDAO is a Data Access Object (DAO) for managing Order objects with CRUD Operations.
OrderStatus
Enum representing the status of an order.
PaymentDAO
PaymentDAO is implemented from DAOInterface.
PaymentMethod
The PaymentMethod class represents a payment method used in transactions.
PaymentService
The PaymentService interface defines methods for simulating payment and authenticating payment.
ScannerProvider
Provides a utility class for obtaining a Scanner object.
Staff
The Staff class represents an employee, manager or admin working in the restaurant company.
StaffApp
The StaffApp class represents the entry point for staff users.
StaffAssignmentController
The StaffAssignmentController class manages staff assignments and promotions within the restaurant chain.
StaffAuthenticationController
The StaffAuthenticationController class provides methods for authenticating staff members.
StaffBranchController
The StaffBranchController class manages operations related to branches by staff members.
StaffDAO
StaffDAO is implemented from DAOInterface.
StaffDisplayController
The StaffDisplayController class handles the display of staff information based on various filters.
StaffLogin
The StaffLogin class represents the authentication process for staff users.
StaffManagementController
The StaffManagementController class handles the management of staff, including adding, editing, and removing staff records.
StaffMenuController
The StaffMenuController class manages operations related to the menu by staff members.
StaffOrderController
The StaffOrderController class manages orders placed by staff members.
StaffOrderForm
The StaffOrderForm class is a boundary level object that represents the form for staff and managers to perform order actions.
StaffPaymentController
The StaffPaymentController class manages operations related to payment methods by staff members.
StaffRole
Enum representing the roles of staff members.
StaffSession
A logger that logs the session for a staff user.
StaffUserView
Interface for defining the behavior of different views for staff, manager and admin roles.
StaffView
Represents the view for staff actions accessible to the staff role.
